honors.title: Awardee of BSI Scholarship Prestasi Batch 2
description: Become an awardee of BSI Scholarship which aims to build future leaders of people who have character, are trustworthy can be role models, and can contribute to building the community, especially in the Sharia economic industry.
Related skills: Project Management, Sharia Economy Literacy, Personal Branding, Leadership

awards.title: Best Research Paper
description: Received for presenting the paper on AI and machine learning.
Competed among researchers from over 50 countries.

awards.title: Hackathon Winner
description: Led a team of 5 to build an innovative app in 24 hours.
Won the grand prize for creativity and technical excellence.
